mapper.sql: select id, assess_order_id, status, status_cn, log_msg, create_time, create_person, user_mobile, user_name from car_assess_order_log
mapper.select: SELECT count(cao.id) FROM car_assess_order cao, car_assess_order_log caol WHERE cao.id = caol.assess_order_id AND ( cao.`status` = '2' OR cao.`status` = '-1' ) AND caol.create_person = #{userId}

SELECT t2.id assess_id, t2.create_user_name user_name, t2.name auto_info_name, t2.car_photo mian_photo, t1.create_time, t1.id assess_order_id FROM car_assess_order t1 INNER JOIN car_assess t2 ON t1.assess_id = t2.id WHERE t1.status = '1' and t1.store_id = #{storeId} ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT t2.create_user_name create_user, t2.name auto_info_name, t2.car_photo mian_photo, t1.create_time FROM car_assess_order t1 INNER JOIN car_assess t2 ON t1.assess_id = t2.id INNER JOIN car_assess_order_log t4 ON t4.assess_order_id = t1.id WHERE ( t4.`status` = '2' OR t4.`status` = '-1' ) AND t4.create_person = #{userId} ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
limit #{startRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{endRowNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}
